remarks: Uniform continuity in metric spaces.  Compare the order of the quantifiers with ~ metcn .  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 26-Jan-2018.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
metucnOLD.u $e |- U = ( metUnifOLD ` C ) $.
metucnOLD.v $e |- V = ( metUnifOLD ` D ) $.
metucnOLD.x $e |- ( ph -> X =/= (/) ) $.
metucnOLD.y $e |- ( ph -> Y =/= (/) ) $.
metucnOLD.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. ( *Met ` X ) ) $.
metucnOLD.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. ( *Met ` Y ) ) $.
metucnOLD $p |- ( ph -> ( F e. ( U uCn V ) <-> ( F : X --> Y /\ A. d e. RR+ E. c e. RR+ A. x e. X A. y e. X ( ( x C y ) < c -> ( ( F ` x ) D ( F ` y ) ) < d ) ) ) ) $.
$d C c d x y $.
$d D c d x y $.
$d F c d x y $.
$d U x y $.
$d V x $.
$d X c d x y $.
$d Y c d x y $.
$d c d ph x y $.
